rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0001
rows.name: This is a fact that not many people know, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Goldmund is actually powered
by manpower, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0003
rows.name:
There's a hidden room in Goldmund with
a running wheel...

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0004
rows.name:
A Nopon gets inside and runs,
which stimulates the Divine Beast
and makes it want to move, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0005
rows.name:
The Goldmund Divine Beast is quite the
laid-back type, so apparently it won't move
unless you do that, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Tondon knows because he went to repair
the running wheel, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_04_msg0007
rows.name: It's a secret from everyone else, mo.
